entities.name: Financial Metric
entities.description: Key financial indicators such as revenue, gross margin.

entities.name: Service
entities.description: Services like Apple TV+, Apple Music.

entities.name: Event
entities.description: Events affecting the company like product launches, COVID-19.

relations.name: Reports
relations.description: An executive reports on a financial metric.

relations.name: Impacts
relations.description: Conditions or events that impact metrics or sales.

relations.name: Participates In
relations.description: A geographic segment participates in financial results.

relations.name: Presents
relations.description: A product or service is presented with associated financial metrics.

relations.name: Occurs During
relations.description: An event occurs during a specific time period.

patterns.head: Executive
patterns.description: An executive reports on a financial metric.

patterns.head: Event
patterns.description: An event impacts a financial metric.

patterns.head: Product
patterns.description: A product is associated with specific financial metrics during a presentation.

patterns.head: Geographic Segment
patterns.description: A geographic segment contributes to financial results.

patterns.head: Market Condition
patterns.description: Market conditions impact the sales or production of a product.
